projectGridLines.title: Project details given below
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Title: Research on Novel Technologies in Flavors and Fragrances for F&B and HPC Products

Description: Interns will delve into the rapidly evolving field of Flavors and Fragrances, analyzing current

market trends, technological advancements, and consumer demands. They will explore the latest innovations

and applications within this sector, particularly focusing on new technologies such as bioprocessing, synthetic

biology, and enzyme technology. The project aims to uncover opportunities for growth and development,

providing insights that can guide Absolute Foods in expanding its product portfolio.

Skill sets: - Strong analytical and research skills. Interest in market analysis and business strategy. Familiarity

with synthetic biology, advanced fermentation, and other relevant technologies.

Expected learning: Gain expertise in market analysis, advanced technologies, and strategic thinking within

the Flavors and Fragrances industry.

Specific courses required for project execution: Students pursuing degrees in Life Sciences,

Biotechnology, Food Technology, or related fields
